summary: Four mistreated farm animals seek refuge as a band of traveling musicians in this musical tale narrated by Kermit the Frog.
cast: Frank Oz|Jerry Nelson|Jim Henson|Richard Hunt|John Lovelady|Danny Seagren|Faz Fazakas|Phyllis Marshall|François Klanfer|Nick Nichols|Bonnie Erickson|Jerry Juhl
title: Tales from Muppetland: The Muppet Musicians of Bremen
